title: Dimentio

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You have the abilities and attributes of a koopa Hypnotist, Blackmailer, Consort, and Godfather combined.
- You may cast a minor illusion to make something appear to happen, but it's going to be revealed on day end, meaning that it doesn't count. Once 4 other town remains, your defense drops to vulnerable, and, if at least two Koopas are still alive, the Koopas join the town, and obtain the wincon of "Eliminate every criminal and evildoer."

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If this spawns, the REF is forcespawned to be Koopa.
- At the start of the game, You will appear to be a koopa role that may disguise itself as town. you will know which koopa role your disguise is.
- Once half the town is dead, it is announced that the show will begin momentarily.
- If the Koopa head is the last Koopa left standing, automatically deal an overkill attack to that old buffon.
- RB immune
- Control immune
- Detection immune

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Unleash the power of the chaos heart.

desc:
Post 3051
*And now it's- Jd why are you wearing that again?*
